about.description: This module implements Geometric Algebras (a.k.a. Clifford algebras). Geometric Algebra (GA) is a universal algebra which subsumes complex algebra, quaternions, linear algebra and several other independent mathematical systems. Scalars, vectors, and higher-grade entities can be mixed freely and consistently in the form of mixed-grade multivectors.
about.summary: A numerical geometric algebra module for python. BSD License.

name: clifford
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "clifford" %}
{% set version = "1.0.5" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/pygae/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: 3d9af40da1076c59bdb44697afa09d1426473098c93aa3ca2c157baa807941ad

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip   
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - numba
    - future
    - h5py
    


test:
  imports:
    - clifford

about:
  home: http://clifford.readthedocs.io
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'A numerical geometric algebra module for python. BSD License.'

  description: |
    This module implements Geometric Algebras (a.k.a. Clifford algebras). Geometric Algebra (GA) is a universal algebra which subsumes complex algebra, quaternions, linear algebra and several other independent mathematical systems. Scalars, vectors, and higher-grade entities can be mixed freely and consistently in the form of mixed-grade multivectors.
  doc_url: http://clifford.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/pygae/clifford

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - arsenovic
